# Triangle

```text
    +-----+       +-----+
    |     |       |     |
    | FOO | ----> | BAZ |
    |     |       |     |
    +-----+       +-----+
       ^             |
       |             |
       |   +-----+   |
       |   |     |   |
       +-- | BAR | <-+
           |     |
           +-----+
```
